mcq.statement: Which bank provided a Rs. 80 million loan to the Government of Pakistan at the request of Quaid-e-Azam when the Reserve Bank of India failed to deliver Pakistan's share?
mcq.one_liner: When the Reserve Bank of India did not deliver Pakistan's share, **Habib Bank Limited** provided a Rs. 80 million loan to the Government of Pakistan at Quaid-e-Azam's request.
